contexts.context: Mr. Lorre has interpreted for me <mark>your</mark> letter of June 4th.
In answer to <mark>your</mark> letter of Sept. 21, 1937 we beg to...
Very truly <mark>yours</mark>, Eli H. Leslie Eli H. Leslie Business Manager...
..., to be applied as a part payment on <mark>your</mark> account.
<mark>Yours</mark> very truly, ML Cashy Business Manager for Peter...
Very truly <mark>yours</mark>, Marcella S. Gardner Sec’y for Berthold Viertel....
